original_title: Kyôretsu môretsu! Kodai shôjo Dogu-chan matsuri! Supesharu mûbî edishon
overview: A stay-at-home nerd's dream comes true when he unearths a strange breastplate and awakens a sexy monster hunter named Dogoo, who brings him along her adventure with wacky monsters.
title: The Ancient Dogoo Girl: Special Movie Edition
